name: Kyurem
description: The Boundary Pokémon. It can produce ultracold air. Its body is frozen.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: Any move targeting this Pokémon directly (non-area of effect moves) reduces its PP by two when activated.

abilities.name: Form Change (Kyurem)
abilities.description: While in the presence of a willing Reshiram or Zekrom, Kyurem can fuse with one of the willing Pokemon, at will, with the help of a DNA Splicer. This process is called Absofusion and will result in a White Kyurem (if fused with Reshiram) or Black Kyurem (if fused with Zekrom).
